String.msg: Don't mill about! Get into formation!
You wanna die? Get into formation right now!
Get it right, before I beat you myself!
Why are you so slow? Did you step in a Tuwangi pie?
Focus! If you don't want to die.
Hold the line! Aim for their weak spots!
Pay attention! Focus on the enemy.
Move it! And keep your eyes open!
Attack! You want to live forever?
The time is now! The enemy is disoriented!
That's the weak spot! Aim for that one first!
Lend me your strength, my brothers!
Now we show our real strength!
Brothers, come out and join us!
Ha ha ha! I will destroy you!
You think this is the end? It's only the beginning!
Behold! An unending torrent of monsters!
We are too many to defeat! Come, my minions!
I'll teach you a lesson. Always keep your guard up!
We will be the last thing you see!
Like leaves in a storm, sweep through the enemy!
Come and take your revenge, my minions!
Welcome my friends! Get that one!
Come on, give it your best!
My magic will get us through!
Behold the wrath of unfettered chaos!
Filth! How dare you touch me!
You want a taste of this?

Focus on one at a time!
Aim for that fool over there!
Float like a bee, sting like a butterf...what?
Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee!
Playtime is over! It's serious now!
I have a family at home...please...
And I was just beginning to enjoy life...
What a pain in the neck!
Your head will make a fine gift.
I'll start with the weakest first...
Did you hear the one about the cornered prey?
Search for the hidden Easter eggs!
I'll be the first to find an egg!
These thieving caimans must be punished!
Ha! You can't even lift your weapon. I don't have to defeat you. Fatigue has done the job for me!
I sell potions, teleport scrolls, and alkahests.
I can help you quickly recover HP and MP.
I can help you quickly recover HP.
I can help you to reach the city of Velika.

Baraka's cry fills the pitch-dark sky.
A cold night approaches, flowers are hiding their faces in the darkness!
Mindless wanderers are bringing ominous fog.
The Valkyon Federation is here to help!
After the darkest hour came the light.
Our God, Balder, lit the world with his blessings and displaced darkness.
The seeker rose, spreading the light of benevolence.
Hence, where there was light, there were praises.
It was South Korea's guardians who claimed victory in the latest World Dungeon Challenge.
The victorious guardians were No-Eul, Lyn, Joker, Hyun-Han, and JunK.
This Dungeon Challenge was simply spectacular!
First place in Europe went to the guardians Assazina, Kaizu, Godlike, Keeto, and howtf, with them finishing third in the global rankings.
A huge round of applause goes to all the skilled guardians around the world.
Japan's numero unos Liemahaa, kilito, HyruIe, and two other guardians took second place worldwide.
South Korea's No-Eul, Lyn, Joker, Hyun-Han, and JunK reached level 53 in Antaroth's Abyss, landing them the global top spot-what an achievement!

Fourth place was taken by South American guardians Aqua, Rxkt, Mune, Taldekk, and Hamtaro. Southeast Asia's guardians Zazuno, Mieruko, Dulce, Saqura, and Nez finished in fifth. Great respect here, too!
Heard the news? It was South Korea's guardians who claimed victory in the World Dungeon Challenge!
In a nutshell: No-Eul, Lyn, Joker, Hyun-Han, and JunK climbed to the top of the world rankings for South Korea.
All guardians turned in excellent performances in the Dungeon Challenge!
The guardians Assazina, Kaizu, Godlike, Keeto, and howtf made it to first place in Europe. Unfortunately, they only finished third globally.
Respect to all seasoned guardians around the world!
Liemahaa, kilito, HyruIe, and two other guardians took first place in Japan, but that was only enough for them to finish second worldwide.
Awesome! South Korea's No-Eul, Lyn, Joker, Hyun-Han, and JunK reached level 53 in Antaroth's Abyss, landing them the top spot globally!
South America's guardians Aqua, Rxkt, Mune, Taldekk, and Hamtaro, and Southeast Asia's Zazuno, Mieruko, Dulce, Saqura, and Nez squared off in an unforgettable battle for fourth and fifth place.
South Korea's guardians emerged victorious in the latest World Dungeon Challenge!
The guardians No-Eul, Lyn, Joker, Hyun-Han, and JunK clinched the world title for South Korea.
All guardians turned in excellent performances in this Challenge!
In the World Dungeon Challenge, Europe's guardians Assazina, Kaizu, Godlike, Keeto, and howtf finished in third place!
It was a magnificent performance from guardians from all over the world!
South Korea's best team of guardians No-Eul, Lyn, Joker, Hyun-Han, and JunK actually made it to level 53 in Antaroth's Abyss, taking the number one spot globally!
Liemahaa, kilito, HyruIe, and two other guardians ranked second in the world for Japan.
South America's guardians Aqua, Rxkt, Mune, Taldekk, and Hamtaro, and Southeast Asia's Zazuno, Mieruko, Dulce, Saqura, and Nez put up spectacular competition.
Lok! Please come back to us!
